scripts.test-unit: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report teamcity --report lcov _mocha -- --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec $(find test/unit -name '*.js')
scripts.test-acceptance: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report teamcity --report lcov _mocha -- --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec $(find test/acceptance -name '*.js')
scripts.test-component: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report teamcity --report lcov _mocha -- --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec $(find test/component -name '*.js')
